name: Darker Gizmodo
description:
All Gizmodo Media Group sites: Lifehacker, IO9, Kinja, Deadspin, Jalopnik, Jezebel, Gizmodo, Kotaku - Completely re-designed in tones of dark gray with light gray text & CSS3 effects.  

Enjoy! 

For support please contact:  https://www.zigboom.com/

discussions.name: Looks Great, Needs One Slight Change
Any way to theme the new Kinja bar?
